title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first try. However, selecting the item for the second time allows for successful selection.
OB: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view.
EB: The second time I select the item, it can be successfully selected.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a label to the library file. 2. Try to select the label item in the library outline view. 3. Observe that the item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
